mapper.select: SELECT ap.id , ap.title , ap.animal_type , CASE WHEN ap.updated_at IS NOT NULL THEN ap.updated_at ELSE ap.created_at END AS display_date , CASE WHEN u.user_name IS NOT NULL THEN u.user_name -- 회원이면 이름 ELSE sh.company_name -- 보호소장이면 보호소명 END AS writer_name , CASE WHEN u.user_name IS NOT NULL THEN r.name -- 회원이면 등급 ELSE NULL -- 보호소장이면 등급 없음 END AS user_rating , ap.view , COUNT(apl.id) AS recommend_count , si.sido_name , sg.sigungu_name FROM adoptionPost ap LEFT JOIN adoptionPostLiked apl ON ap.id = apl.post_id LEFT JOIN user u ON ap.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN rating r ON u.rating_id = r.id LEFT JOIN shelter_head sh ON ap.head_id = sh.head_id LEFT JOIN sigungu sg ON ap.sigungu_id = sg.sigungu_id LEFT JOIN sido si ON sg.sido_id = si.sido_id WHERE ap.status = 'PROTECTING' AND ap.is_blind = 0 GROUP BY ap.id, ap.title, ap.animal_type, ap.created_at, ap.updated_at, ap.user_id, ap.head_id, u.user_name, r.name, sh.company_name, ap.view, si.sido_name, sg.sigungu_name ORDER BY ap.created_at DESC

SELECT ap.id , ap.title , ap.content , ap.user_phone , ap.view , CASE WHEN ap.updated_at IS NOT NULL THEN ap.updated_at ELSE ap.created_at END AS post_display_date
, CASE WHEN u.user_name IS NOT NULL THEN u.user_name -- 회원이면 이름 ELSE sh.company_name -- 보호소장이면 보호소명 END AS writer_name , CASE WHEN u.user_name IS NOT NULL THEN r.name -- 회원이면 등급 ELSE NULL -- 보호소장이면 등급 없음 END AS user_rating
, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT l.id), 0) AS recommend_count , ap.animal_type , ap.breed , ap.age , ap.color , ap.gender , ap.weight , ap.status , ap.vaccination , ap.neutering
, f.id AS file_id , f.file_rename , f.file_path , f.uploaded_at , CONCAT(f.file_path, f.file_rename) AS file_url
, c.id AS comment_id , c.content AS comment_content , CASE WHEN c.updated_at IS NOT NULL THEN c.updated_at ELSE c.created_at END AS comment_display_date , COALESCE(cu.user_name, ch.company_name) AS comment_writer_name
, sg.sigungu_name , si.sido_name FROM adoptionPost ap LEFT JOIN user u ON ap.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN shelter_head sh ON ap.head_id = sh.head_id LEFT JOIN rating r ON u.rating_id = r.id LEFT JOIN adoptionPostLiked l ON ap.id = l.post_id LEFT JOIN adoptionPostFiles f ON ap.id = f.post_id LEFT JOIN adoptionPostComment c ON ap.id = c.post_id AND c.is_blinded = FALSE LEFT JOIN user cu ON c.user_id = cu.user_id LEFT JOIN shelter_head ch ON c.head_id = ch.head_id LEFT JOIN sigungu sg ON ap.sigungu_id = sg.sigungu_id LEFT JOIN sido si ON sg.sido_id = si.sido_id WHERE ap.id = #{id} GROUP BY ap.id, f.id, c.id, sg.sigungu_id, si.sido_id

SELECT ap.id , ap.title , ap.animal_type , CASE WHEN ap.updated_at IS NOT NULL THEN ap.updated_at ELSE ap.created_at END AS display_date , CASE WHEN u.user_name IS NOT NULL THEN u.user_name -- 회원이면 이름 ELSE sh.company_name -- 보호소장이면 보호소명 END AS writer_name , CASE WHEN u.user_name IS NOT NULL THEN r.name -- 회원이면 등급 ELSE NULL -- 보호소장이면 등급 없음 END AS user_rating , ap.view , COUNT(apl.id) AS recommend_count , si.sido_name , sg.sigungu_name FROM adoptionPost ap LEFT JOIN adoptionPostLiked apl ON ap.id = apl.post_id LEFT JOIN user u ON ap.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN rating r ON u.rating_id = r.id LEFT JOIN shelter_head sh ON ap.head_id = sh.head_id LEFT JOIN sigungu sg ON ap.sigungu_id = sg.sigungu_id LEFT JOIN sido si ON sg.sido_id = si.sido_id WHERE ap.status = 'PROTECTING' AND ap.is_blind = 0 GROUP BY ap.id, ap.title, ap.animal_type, ap.created_at, ap.updated_at, ap.user_id, ap.head_id, u.user_name, r.name, sh.company_name, ap.view, si.sido_name, sg.sigungu_name ORDER BY ap.view DESC

SELECT ap.id , ap.title , ap.animal_type , CASE WHEN ap.updated_at IS NOT NULL THEN ap.updated_at ELSE ap.created_at END AS display_date , CASE WHEN u.user_name IS NOT NULL THEN u.user_name -- 회원이면 이름 ELSE sh.company_name -- 보호소장이면 보호소명 END AS writer_name , CASE WHEN u.user_name IS NOT NULL THEN r.name -- 회원이면 등급 ELSE NULL -- 보호소장이면 등급 없음 END AS user_rating , ap.view , COUNT(apl.id) AS recommend_count , si.sido_name , sg.sigungu_name FROM adoptionPost ap LEFT JOIN adoptionPostLiked apl ON ap.id = apl.post_id LEFT JOIN user u ON ap.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN rating r ON u.rating_id = r.id LEFT JOIN shelter_head sh ON ap.head_id = sh.head_id LEFT JOIN sigungu sg ON ap.sigungu_id = sg.sigungu_id LEFT JOIN sido si ON sg.sido_id = si.sido_id WHERE ap.status = 'PROTECTING' AND ap.is_blind = 0 GROUP BY ap.id, ap.title, ap.animal_type, ap.created_at, ap.updated_at, ap.user_id, ap.head_id, u.user_name, r.name, sh.company_name, ap.view, si.sido_name, sg.sigungu_name ORDER BY recommend_count DESC

SELECT ap.id , ap.title , ap.animal_type , CASE WHEN ap.updated_at IS NOT NULL THEN ap.updated_at ELSE ap.created_at END AS display_date , COALESCE(u.user_name, sh.company_name) AS writer_name , ap.view , COALESCE(COUNT(apl.id), 0) AS recommend_count , si.sido_name , sg.sigungu_name FROM adoptionPost ap LEFT JOIN adoptionPostLiked apl ON ap.id = apl.post_id LEFT JOIN user u ON ap.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN shelter_head sh ON ap.head_id = sh.head_id LEFT JOIN sigungu sg ON ap.sigungu_id = sg.sigungu_id LEFT JOIN sido si ON sg.sido_id = si.sido_id WHERE ap.status = 'PROTECTING' AND ap.is_blind = FALSE
AND ap.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND ap.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND ap.breed LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
GROUP BY ap.id, ap.title, ap.animal_type, ap.created_at, ap.updated_at, ap.user_id, ap.head_id, u.user_name, sh.company_name, ap.view, si.sido_name, sg.sigungu_name ORDER BY ap.created_at DESC
